text:
Emil Gabriel Jula (3 January 1980 – 22 August 2020) was a Romanian professional footballer. He played as a striker. He was born in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. In January 2013, he joined VfL Osnabrück. He scored two goals during a match against Hansa Rostock, which ended 3–2 for Osnabrück. In his youth career, he played for Universitatea Cluj between 1989 to 1998.
Jula died on 22 August 2020 from heart failure, aged 40.
